Exploring adult measurement data. 

'AdultData_OffBase.csv' file contains all NET and other adult birds measured between 2001-2015 as per Google Drive CRG Reference Files.

```{r echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
library(tidyverse) 
library(usethis) #git integration
library(tibble)
library(ggpubr) #ggarrange() figure wraps
library(plyr)
theme_set(theme_classic())
```


```{r}
adults <- read.csv("AdultData_OffBase.csv", h=TRUE)
as_tibble(adults)
```


```{r}
summary(adults)
```


```{r sppMetrics, out.width='95%'}
sppWeight <- adults %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=species, y=weight))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  geom_jitter(shape=1)

sppTEC <- adults %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=species, y=tec))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  geom_jitter(shape=1)

sppWing <- adults %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=species, y=wingChord))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  geom_jitter(shape=1) 

sppTail <- adults %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=species, y=tailLength))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  geom_jitter(shape=1)

sppBillNT <- adults %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=species, y=billNT))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  geom_jitter(shape=1)

sppBillW <- adults %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=species, y=billWidth))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  geom_jitter(shape=1)

sppBillD <- adults %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=species, y=billDepth))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  geom_jitter(shape=1)

sppHead <- adults %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=species, y=head))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  geom_jitter(shape=1)

sppMetrics <- suppressWarnings(ggarrange(sppWeight,sppTEC,sppWing,sppTail,sppBillNT,sppBillW,sppBillW,sppHead))

print(sppMetrics)
```
